CR CR.RELATIONSHIP CR.RELATIONSHIP
At present there is limited functionality in Customer Relationship module for registering associations and groupings. CR.RELATIONSHIP enables the grouping of customers who have relationship with the bank. No functionality is coded behind this table. The table covers only the addition of fields and the specified validations.
